channel.title: I have a new PC!
channel.description:
Finally! I am very happy right now :D
My old laptop was horrible it had literally 500MB of RAM (DDR2) available for minecraft to use, 2.00GHZ processor and 50GB HD space with an absolutely horrid graphics card which barely even worked and over heated all the time when on minecraft.
But today, it arrived my new PC. It's not the best PC in the world and probably crappy in comparison to ones out today but to me it's out of this world because I've simply never had a good PC in my life.
Specs:
2.00 GB DDR3 RAM Pentium(R) Dual-Core CPU E5700 @ 3.00GHZ 3.01GHZ 250GB HD Intel(R) G41 Express Chipset (Approx. 841 MB)
Comes with:
W7 home premium
Minecraft runs so smooth and quickly on this - it's bliss.

item.title: I have a new PC!
item.dc:creator: @fcdxsza123 fcdxsza123

@fcdxsza123 wrote:

[quote=“xx matty xx, post:24, topic:420144”][quote author=fcdxsza123 link=topic=522702.msg4083064#msg4083064 date=1345525912]
Ah, i remember when i got my new computer. It was like a month ago lol =D.
[/quote]please tell us more[/quote]I…I… can’t tell if that’s sarcasm or not. . But, its a GTX 550 ti 8 gbs of ram and a core i3 540.

item.title: I have a new PC!
item.dc:creator: @spooty spooty
item.description:
@spooty wrote:

okay, i’m not trying to proclaim it is better as a whole. I’m saying that in terms of response speed it is much better. i use DDR3 too (because it is better).

Read full topic

item.title: I have a new PC!
item.dc:creator: @Tom Tom
item.description:
@Tom wrote:

My point is RAM isn’t just measured by the CAS latency, and that DDR3 as a whole is better than DDR2 you’re basically picking out one factor in which DDR2 > DDR3 then proclaiming that makes it better as a whole.

My article was going against that idea.

Read full topic

item.title: I have a new PC!
item.dc:creator: @spooty spooty
item.description:
@spooty wrote:

Tom_BETA:

http://www.brighthub.com/computing/hardware/articles/12461.aspx

Regardless, look up the average CAS latency for DDR2 and DDR3. you’ll see what I mean.
you can look at articles alllll you want. but the facts remain the same.

Read full topic

item.title: I have a new PC!
item.dc:creator: @hat_trix hat trix
item.description:
@hat_trix wrote:

im using ati atm, everything seems superior being that the video card is on the motherboard. i get maybe 80-120 fps on tiny on minecraft lol :P. other then that, our computers are like exactly the same.

Read full topic

item.title: I have a new PC!
item.dc:creator: @Tom Tom
item.description:
@Tom wrote:

Bright Hub

DDR2 vs DDR3 Memory: What's the Difference?

Here we address the core differences between DDR2 and DDR3 memory. Is DDR3 better than DDR2 memory? Find out using our comparison between the two. Each type offers advantages so learn which one will benefit you the most in your laptop or desktop...

Read full topic

item.title: I have a new PC!
item.dc:creator: @spooty spooty
item.description:
@spooty wrote:

Just so you know ddr2 ram is much better than ddr3 ram in terms of speed. ddr2 has much lower cas latency than ddr3.
but if you’re running out of memory that doesnt do you any good ^.^

Read full topic

item.title: I have a new PC!
item.dc:creator: @Tom Tom
item.description:
@Tom wrote:

omgilikepie:

I hate my intel express chipset…It’s so laggy with it on minecraft =/ They aren’t even real video cards you know, just meant for the basic graphics to be displayed on your monitor.

Not sure what’s wrong there, I couldn’t of asked for better in regards to gaming with it. I get 60+ FPS constantly on short render, then when I have everything to the full (fancy, full render, smooth lighting ect) I get around 25-35 FPS which is a great leap from my 4 FPS when everything was on low on my old laptop

Moparisthebest:

Congratulations Tom, though I can’t believe an integrated Intel graphics chipset is doing very well on minecraft or any games, you should have gotten one with either ATI (or is it AMD now?), or Nvidia with it.

Thanks, my old laptop had ATI - never again. I got an avg of 4 FPS when everything was on low.

Read full topic

item.title: I have a new PC!
item.dc:creator: @xx_matty_xx Justin Bieber
item.description:
@xx_matty_xx wrote:

[quote=“CoonHunter, post:6, topic:420144”][quote author=Davidi2 link=topic=522702.msg3801862#msg3801862 date=1320093615]
Especially one as bad as Tom’s old one

Grats Tom!
[/quote]
Back when I first started rsps I took a laptop from 01 and worked on a server that held around 60 people before any noticeable lag. This server was allegations based lol. The horribly known reapage scape lol. It works better than you would think if you do it right. I gave that computer to my boss lol.

Specs on the old one.
800mhz processor
512mb ddr ram
20gb idea hdd.[/quote]Yeah, I had a similarly horrific set up with the same amount of players and it actually works fairly well.

Read full topic
